comment: I took HMGT 3300. This class was so easy I never went to class. I got 100 on every science and exams are no lockdown/webcam. Really easy A, Takeee !!!

Mel's class is very easy to pass with an A. In fact, so easy that almost no one goes to class. Grade is based off of discussion posts, a few short papers, and 3 exams. He grades very easily so simply showing effort will get you a good grade. Nice and understanding guy.

One of the most understanding and helpful professors at KSU. He genuinely is passionate about what he teaches and wants the class to be engaged in the material in every aspect. The course is almost entirely two-exams, but he provides studying material and genuinely wants to help you. Please do yourself a favor and take his class.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Madanoglu is great at communicating his expectations in class and sticks closely to the syllabus. He typically takes a week to grade, but he is an easy grader. Just follow the guideline he sets and you will pass with an A in the class. I would definitely recommend taking him over the summer.

One of my favorite professors! He provides excellent real world examples in class that really helps you understand the material better. He works hard to get guest speakers to talk to us and provide us with the possible paths we could take in the field. Grades consist of many discussion posts and a few tests, super easy, hard to fail. HMGT3500

i had him for a hybrid class, i only showed up on the first day of class. he seemed to really care about the class but was very easy information to learn from home. its an easy A and if u go to class if would be a interesting class to attend. had 3 quizzes and 2 tests but super easy
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Asynchronous course with one test (final), discussion board, weekly quizzes and a semester long group project. He also offers some extra credit which is helpful to improve a final grade. However, do read the syllabus or any announcements that he posts carefully so that you do not miss anything on the assignments.

Professor Madanoglu was amazing! The course was very easy to navigate especially being an eight-week summer course. I would highly recommend taking this professor to learn about Hospitality Management in an easy and efficient way!

Madanoglu is the best! His class was so easy to the point where it was easier than some of my gen ed classes. He is super nice and responds really quickly to emails. You can earn bonus points throughout the semester even though you dont really need to. Theres 2 tests including the final and 4 quizzes, but its not stressful. Take him!!!
